ocetiertagger.name: OceTierTagger
ocetiertagger.config.highest.desc:
- Never: only display tiers in the selected gamemode
- When Not Found: if a person isn't ranked in the current selected gamemode, show their highest tier overall
- Always: display a person's highest tier, regardless of the gamemode
ocetiertagger.outdated.title: §c§lOutdated OceTierTagger version detected !!!
ocetiertagger.outdated.desc:
A new version has been found: %s!
It is §nhighly recommended§r to update to keep the mod working!
ocetiertagger.obsolete.title: §c§lObsolete Minecraft version detected !!!
ocetiertagger.obsolete.desc:
You are playing on an §nunsupported Minecraft version.§r
This version is likely broken, and you should consider upgrading your Minecraft as soon as possible.
